entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
